resources.string: Casual and coastal-inspired, our Newport Sofa boasts clean lines and deep seats with an airy but durable kiln-dried wooden platform.

Our two-tiered Art Display Coffee Table doubles down on mid-century style and storage space with its durable, tempered glass top and sophisticated finish. An open shelf offers room for baskets and your favorite reads.

Our Parker Collection is all about understated elegance, featuring modern shapes, quality materials and subtle tailored touches. Its headboard features a single channel stitch up top and comes covered in your choice of fabric. Each is Contract Grade, meaning it is extra durable.

Made from richly-grained solid mango wood and lofted on blackened steel legs, our Industrial Storage Media Console brings an earthy charm to the bare-bones media console. In a grand 80-inch size, it features four drawers and two open shelvesâ€”that means even more space to store books, cable boxes and other electronics.
Designed with smaller spaces in mind, our Ladder Shelf Desk has a compact footprint and comes at a great value. It fits in with an eclectic mix of bedroom or living room styles.
